thread.title: Listen to Lady Gaga's voice during the Super Bowl without the music
thread.title_full: Listen to Lady Gaga's voice during the Super Bowl without the music - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Listen to Lady Gaga's voice during the Super Bowl without the music
text:
Photo: Brett Coomer/Houston Chronicle Image 1 of / 53 53 Lady Gaga performs during halftime of Super Bowl LI at NRG Stadium on Sunday, Feb. 5, 2017, in Houston.
YouTube user Arkadiusz Tuszek isolated her vocals from the performance and posted the audio online.
Click through the slideshow to see more photos from Gaga's Super Bowl performance.

Photo: Michael Ciaglo, Houston Chronicle Image 53 of 53 Listen to Lady Gaga's voice during the Super Bowl without the music 1 / 53 Back to Gallery It's universally agreed that Lady Gaga killed it during her Super Bowl performance in Houston.
From drones to high-flying theatrics , the singer wowed the crowd at NRG stadium. It wasn't just her stage performance that made the halftime show memorable though.
TROLLS: Lady Gaga responds to body-shaming haters in unapologetic Instagram post
As Buzzfeed reports, YouTube user Arkadiusz Tuszek isolated Gaga's vocals from the rest of her performance so people could focus on her voice. The result is astonishing, given how well Gaga sings while dancing and, at times, soars through the air while attached to wires. It's hard to not wonder if she's super human.
Check out her singing here:
For comparison, here's her Super Bowl performance with the rest of the music:
